ygData.subject: Re: Guise of the Deceiver
ygData.msgSnippet: Well since Dark Elf are not KOS in the Troll and Ogre city it would make a great disguise.  Its much easier to pass yourself off as a dark elf than a Troll in
ygData.messageBody:
Well since Dark Elf are not KOS in the Troll and Ogre city it would make
a great disguise. Its much easier to pass yourself off as a dark elf
than a Troll in a a Troll city. (Since when your a troll you have to
remember to scratch your butt all day, and put lots of Z's in your
sentences)

>
> 4. Ever think of why a froglok assasin would have an item that would change
> them into a DE? The frogs are natural enemies to the Trolls and Ogres
> (possibly the DE's too not sure). Mayhaps there was some subterranean plot
> afoot to strike against the Tier'Dal horde or evil races in general before
> the frogs died? (This sorta falls apart if you consider the undead frogs as
> plotting against the evil races since they attack everyone...)
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
